name: Out Of Place (robertindygames, bbindy, starafire, Foxxie_Q)
name_original: Out Of Place (robertindygames, bbindy, starafire, Foxxie_Q)
description:
Description:

Marie is a adventure seeking inventor who doesn't quite feel accepted in her Fantasy game genre. In a genius attempt at finding where she truly belongs, she invents a device to her into a new, unexplored game. Her best friend, Prince Cassius, is not too thrilled about the idea but Marie manages to drag him along with her. But jumping through different game genre's may not be everything Marie had initially hoped for.  Can Marie and Cassius figure out how to get back home again? 

The Team : 

Programmer - Robert Burita - Itch.io: robertindygames Twitter: @robertindygames

Fantasy Artist - Amelia Harden - Instagram: @amelia_bbindy  and Twitter: @Ameliabbindy

Horror Artist - Gabrielle Bayani - Instagram: @starafire

Writer - Kayleigh Jones -  Itch.io: foxxie_q Twitter: @Foxxie_Q
